## contacts.Api.create() method

Create a new contact and returns the contact.

Currently only Person and Company contacts are supported.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create(request: CreateContactRequest): Promise<Contact>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [CreateContactRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.contacts.createcontactrequest.md) | the create request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Contact](./smokeball-client-sdk.contacts.contact.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```
const request: CreateContactRequest = {
 // Specify the fields here.
};
const contact = await sdk.contacts.create(request);
```
